channel.title: Google on Martin Chorley
channel.description: Recent content in Google on Martin Chorley

item.title: How to access and download your Google Web History with wget
item.description: Google Web History has now been recording all of the searches I made in Google since about 2005. Obviously 6 years of search queries and results is a phenomenal amount of data, and it would be nice to get hold of it all to see what I could make of it. Fortunately Google make the data available as an RSS feed, although it’s not particularly well documented. (caution - many ‘ifs’ coming up next)
